posts.post_content:
Clark, Columbus P350

An extra for me, got it on and it's not quite as nice as my other one.

The good stuff:
Decent corners, ok centering l-r a bit high top to bottom, decent color, nice clean back.
The bad stuff:
A stain at the left at head level that only shows from the front, Some more along the right side, and a light crease that doesn't show in the scan roughly from the bottom of the cap up towards the right across the top of the cap.

Looking to trade for a card I don't already have in similar condition. T206, maybe T205, raw or graded, either way. I'd consider other trades too.   

If nothing interesting comes up in a few days I'll put a price on it. Ok, no trades at all so how about $35 shipped?

Steve B 

[IMG]http://www.mindspring.com/~sblackstone/jan010.jpg[/IMG]

Bump to add price. Trades still ok.

Steve B
